titles.title: DNA Database Completion Act of 2005
DNA Database Completion Act of 2005

To authorize the grant program for elimination of the nationwide backlog in analyses of DNA samples at the level necessary to completely eliminate the backlog and obtain a DNA sample from every person convicted of a qualifying offense.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: DNA Database Completion Act of 2005 - Amends the DNA Analysis Backlog Elimination Act of 2000 to authorize appropriations for each of FY2005-FY2009 for grants to eligible states for DNA (deoxyribonucleic acid) analysis.
